entry.title: Buzzed Bunnies
entry.content:
Buzzed Bunnies are a NFT+Collectible series

from Mike D (Doc_Inks)

Inspired by the story of Oswald the Unlucky Rabbit, Buzzed Bunnies follow Oswald’s series of incarnations, “buzzed, baked & breakin’ rulez”

Stay tuned for a series of stellar products, projects, and events from Buzzed Bunnies!

Buzzed Bunnies Website

entry.title: The Butterfly Sutras
entry.content:
The Butterfly Sutras are multimedia NFTs composed of butterflies gently fluttering on backgrounds generated from the seeds of the Yoga-Sutras.

The Butterfly Sutras are the work of creative artist Martianina.
entry.summary: The Butterfly Sutras are multimedia NFTs composed of butterflies gently fluttering on backgrounds generated from the seeds of the Yoga-Sutras. The Butterfly Sutras are the work of creative artist Martianina.

entry.title: Gods of Block
entry.content:
In ancient times

both creative innovation and commerce grew around gods, housed in temples, which were the centres of artistic and financial activity.

Legends and myths about Gods formed part of transparent public records maintained by communities. And under such a system both art and commerce exploded and expanded.

Thousands of years later,

shamans of the Metaverse have established media of communication and expression that takes artistic and commercial innovation to uncharted frontiers.

Find out more about this fascinating metaverse project.
entry.summary: In ancient times both creative innovation and commerce grew around gods, housed in temples, which were the centres of artistic and financial activity. Legends and myths about Gods formed part of transparent public records maintained by communities. And under such a system both art and commerce exploded and expanded. Thousands of years later, shamans of the Metaverse have established media of communication and expression that takes artistic and commercial innovation to uncharted frontiers. Find out more about this fascinating metaverse project.
